item.description:
Have a great time putting your esoteric knowledge to good use.  Pub trivia is a fun social event.  We compete with other teams at the bar for prizes and bragging rights.  If you have played before you know the drill.  If you have not, it is fairly easy to catch on.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to join us.  Do you watch TV?  Movies?  Listen to Music?  Eat?  Know a little history?  Geography?  Everyone knows something about the world and can make a great contribution to the game as well as to the conversations while we play.  A diversity of knowledge makes both a better trivia team and a more interesting and fun evening as a group.  Come on out!

Trivia is free.  Please bring cash for what you eat and drink.  It makes splitting the bill much easier.

If your plans change please update your RSVP as soon as possible.  Often people cancel the day of the event and that is not enough time for someone else who really wanted to attend.  People who frequently no show and/or cancel close to the event may be removed from the group.
item.name: Boston Area Pub Trivia
